channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. economy poised to dominate for the next 20 years — at the cost of growing inequality, economist says
item.description: U.S. economic dominance over other countries is poised to surge in the next 20 years due to its widening lead in technology and science, but at the ex...

item.title: Bitcoin Hits $100,000, Lifted by Hopes of a Crypto-Friendly Washington
item.description: The world’s largest digital currency has staged an extraordinary rally since Election Day. Some market veterans see irony in crypto’s embrace of polit...

item.title: Bitcoin breaks $100,000, boosted by Trump’s crypto embrace and Powell’s remarks
item.description: Bitcoin stages a remarkable comeback two years after the implosion of FTX to hit this $100,000 milestone, helped along by Wall Street titans who bet o...

item.title: Gold Capped by Prospects of Higher Inflation
item.description: Gold’s upside potential is capped by expectations that inflationary pressures could rise under a Trump presidency, prompting the Fed to maintain highe...

item.title: American Eagle’s stock drops as warm fall weather bites into clothing sales
item.description: American Eagle’s stock falls 13% Thursday, and a J.P. Morgan analyst cuts its rating to neutral.

item.title: Liquor giant Brown-Forman’s stock rises as it signals growth ahead despite market challenges
item.description: Brown-Forman Corp.’s stock rose 8% in premarket trading on Thursday after the liquor maker beat Wall Street estimates for profit and revenue in its la...

item.title: Market Timing Has Picked Up Since Covid. It Has Cost Investors Dearly.
item.description: Research finds investors in all categories of active funds have been trying to buy low and sell high—and they aren’t very good at it

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Gains as Near-Term Forecasts Add Some Cold
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures picked up as weather forecasts shifted colder for next week, implying higher demand.

item.title: ‘I want to do the right thing’: My ex-husband is worth 10 times what I’m worth. Is it fair that we contribute equally to our son’s college education?
item.description: “When I suggested I now want to pay less, my former spouse said he didn’t want to finance my savings.”

item.title: U.S. Stocks Little Changed after Setting Record Highs
item.description: Stock indexes were little changed after strong tech earnings had helped power benchmarks to new record highs in the previous session.
